Disembrangling Programming

The simple life of a web developer — by Paul Craciunoiu (About)

Weekly update

Last week (April 5-9)

  • kitsune

    • r? exclude staging articles from search, which also includes sphinx tests, reviewed again later after a fix to not require FORCE_DB
    • r? l10n -> tower rename
    • r? add JINJA_CONFIG() for string extraction and caching
    • quick look at minify in kitsune, TODO next week
    • fixed duplicate page param in paginator URL
    • spent most of the week converting our current database from latin1 to utf8

  • tiki

    • started work on adding WebTrends to SUMO for tracking
    • push desktop 1.5.3 on Tuesday — see bugs

This week (April 12-16)

  • kitsune

    • r? minify bug 550515
    • r? tiki patch for django sessions
    • r? cool vim indenting in templates
    • finish up character encoding conversion
    • finish up when to trigger advanced search
    • finish getting sessions into kitsune, i.e. fix any issues spotted by davedash/jbalogh/jsocol on bug 553131

  • tiki

    • finish adding WebTrends to SUMO for tracking

Stretch goals

  • search summaries are Jinja-friendly

I work as a web developer for Mozilla, with main focus on Django, Python, and PHP. Occasionally, I write tutorials or post other information I find interesting.

I enjoy doing freelance work for other websites, mostly non-profits. If you're interested in my services, contact me through one of the links below.
